user_question: How can I secure my home network from cyber threats and generate an image of a secure home network setup?
final_answer: To secure your home network, use a strong password for your Wi-Fi, enable network encryption, update your router firmware, disable remote management, and use a firewall. Image of a secure home network setup generated. It is recommended to check for router firmware updates every three to six months.
